start.state: So is this some kind of card game? I wish that idiot Ruby would have told me the rules first before dragging me along!

case.state: Okay, this is a bit strange...
Alright! I think I'm a natural at this game... naturally!
Oh, I like this.
Your turn!
Hmm? What's wrong?
Yang never said it'd look like that...
W-wow, I've never seen one before!
I'm not sure what to think of this...
Well this sure is... something.
Oh, my god... That looks like it would hurt! Do girls really...?
But that's your... And with people around...
Y-you have something underneath there, right?!
Excuse me!?
I don't like that look...
Are you about to...?
What's that look about!?
That look suits you.
Not bad!
So we're just betting things that cost money right? I wonder how much that was worth...
I wonder if that was worth anything?
Does that really count? Is there a rulebook or something?
Wait, what happens now?
I can't believe I'm in the same room as you!
Wait, what are you doing?
Well, that was weird. Moving on...
I've never seen someone else's before...
I thought you were only supposed to show that to the person you married! But wait, in the locker room Ruby and the others have probably already seen... Gah! Now I'm just confused!
This is so weird to be seeing that... and not from the perspective of my mirror.
What! What do you mean!?
Oh. I wasn't expecting... this.
Wait, are you really...
It looked nice on you, oh well.
Now let's continue.
Normally I'd complain a bit more, but now I'm kind of interested.
Sun would probably appreciate all that muscle stuff more than I do...
W-what are you doing? Don't take that off! I'm standing right here you pervert!
Oh, my god, no. No no no no no!
You beat Sun in my book. Maybe just in personality though.
Oh, my... I didn't think Yang would ever have a rival...
Is this what Neptune feels like when he looks at Yang?
Okay, this is a bit strange...
Alright! I think I'm a natural at this game... naturally!
Wait, what happens now?
You're okay with everyone watching!?
Wait, what are you doing?
Is that... Oh, my god!
Alright! Put it in the pile!
Into the prize pool it goes!
God, it's so... messy.
I don't care what Neptune or anyone else thinks, small is the best size!
Don't be ashamed, I think they're perfect!
Small really is the perfect size, I should know!
I still have a few more years ahead of me right? Mine could totally look like those soon, r-right?
I didn't think I'd see girls start flashing each other when I came here. What's this game called again?
Okay, I think I'm getting the hang of this. Now you take a valuable off, right?
Your turn to take something valuable off!
I can't believe I just watched all that... I'm so glad I won. I don't know if I could handle coming again...
Oh. I wasn't expecting... this.
Are you sure about this?
Ooh, saucy.
Your turn!
That looked like it felt... Oh...
Are you taking off your... Oh my, you are!
The look on your face makes me glad It's NOT My Turn.
This is so lewd! I can't believe this is happening!
Excuse me!?
I don't like that look...
Are you about to...?
What's that look about!?
I can't believe I'm in the same room as... that!
I guess it is a bit warm in here.
Not bad!
Oh, my god, are you about to...?
I don't think I'll be the first to lose!
I may be new at this, but I think I'll do just fine.
Yes! Fear the almighty power of my cards! Cower as they pillage your homes and weep as they take your children from your very arms!
I hope I'm not the first to lose...
This game doesn't seem too hard... Right?
I don't really know what I'm doing. I think these are okay?
Well, some of these have letters instead of numbers on them. Is that a good thing?
Hey you, give me ~cards~ cards.
Ugh, I'll take ~cards~ cards.
I'm getting the hang of this! Give me ~cards~ new cards.
So, what happens if I lose again?
What are these things in the corners? Are they supposed to be different?
I miss my ~clothing~ already...
I thought I had this figured out. I guess it was just luck.
Wait, I didn't win? Why hasn't anyone told me how to play yet?! No fair!
I lost the first round? This game is hardly fair!
So what, you just bet valuable things? Hmph, do you even know how rich I am? Take the necklace, and the earrings too.
I guess I was bound to lose eventually. I'm sure you guys have been waiting all game for this.
Blake, what are you doing!?
Blake, I never thought I'd...
We live together, but I've never...
This feels really wrong...
We live together, but I've never...
This feels really wrong...
Blake, I never thought I'd...
I promise not to look, okay?
I don't know about this game anymore...
Oh, my... You...
I hope this won't affect our teamwork...

I promise not to look, okay?
I don't know about this game anymore...

Wait, what now?

Your fingers were so fast...

Not exactly the reward I was thinking of...
Beacon has dulled my excitement around shirtless men.
I... guess that's worth my earrings?
I can't bear to look...
I don't want to end up like her...
Does that... fit? Oh, my god, did I just ask that...
I can't believe you're about to...
I can't believe I'm watching you do something like this.
Excuse me!?
I don't like that look...
Are you about to...?
What's that look about!?
I'm unfamiliar with the scale here. How do you decide on what to bet?
I don't really get how this game works.
I don't really get how this game works.
Does this really count? Is there a rulebook or something?
I hope you're okay with losing that. I have plenty just like it, so I guess I can part with some if I have to.
If it's a matter of money here, I don't think anyone's got me beat.
I'm not sure about this...
Oh, wow...
I've won this round! Now, what do I get?
I won't look, I promise!
I won't look! I'm not some kind of pervert!
And I only lost my necklace...
And all I lost were my earrings...
Does this really count? Is there a rulebook or something?
I hope you're okay with losing that. I have plenty just like it, so I guess I can part with some if I have to.

Don't worry, I'll make sure to sell it for a good price when I win this prize pool!
I thought card games were just for children, but I guess not. Sooo can I go now?

Small really is the perfect size, I should know!

Easy does it, boy.

At least everyone's looking at you now!

But I'm this close to losing that too... No! I can't think like that!
Rubbing like that...
Oh, you're taking that off? But that's... and I'm...
